title: LEFT
description: Returns a substring containing the specified number of characters from the beginning (left side) of the provided string. If num_chars exceeds the string length, the entire string is returned.

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: The string to extract characters from.

parameters.name: num_chars
parameters.description: The number of characters to extract from the left.

examples:
LEFT("Hello World", 5)
-- Returns: "Hello"
-- Extracts the first 5 characters from "Hello World".

LEFT("Test", 10)
-- Returns: "Test"
-- Since "Test" has only 4 characters, the entire string is returned.

LEFT(CaseNumber, 3)
-- Extracts the first 3 characters from the field CaseNumber.
-- For example, if CaseNumber is "ABC12345", the result is "ABC".

tips.text: num_chars must be a non-negative integer. If num_chars is 0, an empty string is returned.
